original_title: John Paul II Vol 3: 1992-1995: Witness to Peace
overview: Produced by the Vatican Television Center, this third volume of the story of Pope John Paul II's life explores his years in the papacy from 1992-95 and his influence on peace around the globe. With his enormous energy, the pope played a role in many historical events, including the fall of Communism in Europe, the democratic transformation of Latin America and the Middle Eastern peace process -- leading to a Nobel Peace Prize nomination in 2004.
title: John Paul II Vol 3: 1992-1995: Witness to Peace
